text:
Hi, I'm trying to run a peer with security feature on but getting following error. I'm starting up membersrvc first and then trying to run a peer with enrollment ID and secretkey. 15:11:56.583 [main] serve -> INFO 00c Security enabled status: true
15:11:56.583 [eventhub_producer] start -> INFO 00d event processor started
15:11:56.584 [main] serve -> INFO 00e Privacy enabled status: true
15:11:56.585 [main] func1 -> DEBU 00f Registering validator with enroll ID: test_vp0
15:11:56.586 [crypto] RegisterValidator -> INFO 010 Registering validator [test_vp0] with name [test_vp0]...
15:11:56.588 [crypto] Debugf -> DEBU 011 [validator.test_vp0] Data will be stored at [/var/hyperledger/production/crypto/validator/test_vp0]
15:11:56.589 [crypto] Debugf -> DEBU 012 [validator.test_vp0] Registering node [test_vp0]...
15:11:56.589 [crypto] Debugf -> DEBU 013 [validator.test_vp0] Keystore path [/var/hyperledger/production/crypto/validator/test_vp0/ks] missing [true]: [<clean>]
15:11:56.590 [crypto] Debugf -> DEBU 014 [validator.test_vp0] Creating Keystore at [/var/hyperledger/production/crypto/validator/test_vp0/ks]...
15:11:56.591 [crypto] Debug -> DEBU 015 [validator.test_vp0]  Open Keystore DB...
15:11:56.591 [crypto] Debug -> DEBU 016 [validator.test_vp0]  Ping Keystore DB...
15:11:56.592 [crypto] Debugf -> DEBU 017 [validator.test_vp0] Keystore created at [/var/hyperledger/production/crypto/validator/test_vp0/ks].
15:11:56.593 [crypto] Debugf -> DEBU 018 [validator.test_vp0] Keystore opened at [/var/hyperledger/production/crypto/validator/test_vp0/ks]...done
15:11:56.594 [crypto] Debug -> DEBU 019 [validator.test_vp0]  Registering node crypto engine...
15:11:56.595 [crypto] Debug -> DEBU 01a [validator.test_vp0]  Initiliazing TLS...
15:11:56.596 [crypto] Debug -> DEBU 01b [validator.test_vp0]  Initiliazing TLS...Disabled!!!
15:11:56.597 [crypto] Debug -> DEBU 01c [validator.test_vp0]  Getting ECA client...
15:11:56.598 [crypto] Debugf -> DEBU 01d [validator.test_vp0] Dial to addr:[172.17.0.1:2375], with serverName:[OBC]...
15:11:56.599 [crypto] Debug -> DEBU 01e [validator.test_vp0]  TLS disabled...
15:11:56.599 [crypto] Debug -> DEBU 01f [validator.test_vp0]  Getting ECA client...done
2016/07/18 15:11:57 grpc: ClientConn.resetTransport failed to create client transport: connection error: desc = "transport: write tcp 172.17.0.3:48937->172.17.0.1:2375: write: broken pipe"; Reconnecting to "172.17.0.1:2375"
2016/07/18 15:11:57 transport: http2Client.notifyError got notified that the client transport was broken unexpected EOF.
